page.title: 02A Typical Morning at School
page.content: My day usually begins at{7.00am,}when either my mum or the alarm wakes me. I lie in bed for about 10 mins then I go downstairs for my breakfast.I usually have cereal.After my breakfast I go into the bathroom to get washed and brush my teeth,then I go upstairs into my bedroom to get dressed.I watch {TV.am Breakfast Show.}My transport to Great Houghton J.& I.School is a{car driven by my dad.When the bell goes we do "7 a Day"maths.We then continue with{"Fletcher Maths".}At about 9.10 we go into the main hall for an assembly with Mr.Moulder,the{local {curate}who comes in on Wednesdays to show us pictures and to tell us{Bible {Stories.}The morning break lasts for 15 mins.When we come in from playtime we continue with our work until lunch. I have sandwiches,biscuits and pop but most children have{school dinner.}
